data.question: What is the chemical formula of the metal-organic framework GNU-1?
What is the crystal system of GNU-1?
At what temperature were the gas adsorption measurements for GNU-1a performed?
What method was used for Grand Canonical Monte Carlo simulations in the study?
Does GNU-1 exhibit good stability in acid-base and water environments?
Is GNU-1's structure based on a hexacarboxylate ligand with C2 symmetry?
Was GNU-1 synthesized using a ligand conformation preorganization strategy?
Does GNU-1 have a higher adsorption capacity for CH4 compared to C3H8 and C2H6?
What is the space group of GNU-1?
What is the maximum uptake of N2 by GNU-1a at 77 K?
What is the selectivity of GNU-1a for C3H8/CH4 at 298 K and 1 bar?
What is the Langmuir-Freundlich parameter bA for GNU-1a?
data.answer: bA is temperature dependent and calculated using bA0exp(EA/RT)

data.question: Is GNU-1 capable of completely separating ternary CH4/C2H6/C3H8 mixtures at ambient temperature?
What is the role of the ligand H6bmipia in the structure of GNU-1?
data.answer: It is used to construct MOFs for balancing the adsorption capacity and selectivity for NG upgrading.

data.question: Does GNU-1 have a unique pore environment for recovering C3H8 and C2H6 from natural gas?

What is the crystallographic density (ρcalc) of GNU-1?
What is the CCDC deposition number for GNU-1?
Is the framework of GNU-1 considered rigid during Grand Canonical Monte Carlo simulations?
What is the BET surface area of GNU-1a?
